text: William Westwood Lockyer (born May 8, 1941) is an American politician. He was the State Treasurer of California from 2007 to 2015. He was also the California Attorney General from 1999 to 2007. He was the President Pro Tempore of the California State Senate from 1994 to 1998. ==Other websites== * California State Treasurer Bill Lockyer Official state site * Bill Lockyer for state treasurer Official campaign site * Follow the Money â€“ Bill Lockyer 2006 campaign contributions * *Join California Bill Lockyer Category:1941 births Category:California attorneys general Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Oakland, California Category:Politicians from Oakland, California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:State legislators of the United States
title: Bill Lockyer
